desc: Removes Weak, Sick or Injury from one ally.

dictionary.lore: A potion made from powdered Bue Nut dissolved in Blue Drops. Its uses vary from recovery from illness, to healing injuries. In addition to Tonic it was also known as panacia, or a cure-all, but due to confusion over its effects it simply came to be known by what it's called today.

name: Tonic
